items.sentence: Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy what he needed.
Tom doesn\'t know the first thing about programming.
For some reason the microphone didn\'t work earlier.
Tom should\'ve told Mary that she needed to do that.
Tom doesn\'t have to help us if he doesn\'t want to.
Drinking on an empty stomach is bad for your health.
Even intelligent people are sometimes absent-minded.
Everyone would like to believe dreams can come true.
Tom lost control of his car and slammed into a wall.
Tom made himself a peanut butter sandwich for lunch.
